i_head: I. Details of household toilet facility
i: 1) Does the house have a private toilet?
i_A: A. If yes, are the door, cup and suction pits of the toilet in good condition?
i_B: B. Does the toilet have water supply?
i_Bi: i. If yes, is there water facility inside or near the toilet?
i_CB: A septic tank is a toilet
i_CBi: If yes, is the digester connected to the suction bath?
iN_A: A. Do family members share any toilet within the housing complex?
iN_B: B. Do family members use nearby public toilet/sanitary facility?
iN_Bi: i. Distance from house to public toilet/sanitary facility in meters (ideal)
iN_C: C. Do family members defecate in the open?
iN_D: D. Is there a place to build a private toilet?
iN_Di: i. If yes then the place where toilet is proposed to be constructed
ii_head: II. Household level sewage management details
ii_A: A. Is the household garden designed to drain waste water (grey water / brown water) from the kitchen and bathroom in the house?
ii_B: B. Does the individual have a suction cavity?
ii_Bi: i. If yes, is individual suction pit in use?
ii_Bii: ii. If not, is there space available to build a suction pit in the house?
ii_C: C. Is it connected to a sewer?
iii_head: III. Household level solid waste details
iii_A: A. Is there a facility to make compost with compostable waste at household level?
iii_B: B. Do you have space to set up compost pit at home?
iii_C: C. Does the Panchayat collect household waste?
iii_Ci: i. If yes then how many days is collected once?
